goal.ch: 課程將詳細介紹現代結構控制理論之基礎，課程內容包含主動、半主動與被動結構控制於土木領域應用之介紹、結構動力系統於狀態空間之建立、結構控制之最佳化等。
goal.en: This course introduces the fundamental concepts of modern structural control theory. The course materials include an introduction of active, semi-active and passive structural control application in civil engineering field; the state-space representation of the structural dynamic system and the optimal control of system.

outline.ch:
現代結構控制理論介紹
被動結構控制系統
主動結構系統
連續時間之狀態空間
離散時間之狀態空間
LQR最佳化控制
LQG最佳化控制
outline.en:
Introduction of modern structural control theory
Passive structural control system
Active structural control system
Continuous-time state-space representation
Discrete-time state-space representation
Linear-Quadratic Regulator (LQR) control Algorithm
Linear-Quadratic Gaussian (LQG) control Algorithm

textbook.ch:
講義
Active, Hybrid, and Semi-active Structural Control: A Design and Implementation Handbook, by S. Y. Chu, T. T. Soong and A. M Reinhorn, Wiley 2005.
Passive Energy Dissipation Systems in Structural Engineering, by T. T. Soong and G. F. Dargush, Wiley 1997.
textbook.en:
Lecture notes
Active, Hybrid, and Semi-active Structural Control: A Design and Implementation Handbook, by S. Y. Chu, T. T. Soong and A. M Reinhorn, Wiley 2005.
Passive Energy Dissipation Systems in Structural Engineering, by T. T. Soong and G. F. Dargush, Wiley 1997.

gradMethod.ch:
期中考  25％             
期末考  25％
課程練習 25％
課程競賽 25％

flexDiscription.ch: 此2週之彈性教學，將以專題、補充教學或補救教學等學習方式進行。
flexDiscription.en: These two weeks of flexible teaching schedule, which will be conducted in the form of project, supplement or remedial teaching and other learning methods.

研發創新及獨立解決問題之能力

en.competencies: The Ability of Planning and Implementing Research Projects
The Ability in Writing Technical Papers

The Ability of Interdisciplinary Integration and Coordination
